website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaPad Z400 Touch is a desktop replacement laptop with plenty of great features that make it stand out from the crowd: namely performance and features that help ease the replacement of an older laptop.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is fantastic. The battery life, screen resolution, and overall speed are excellent. The touchscreen works perfectly, and makes Windows 8 much easier to get to grips with. The keyboard feels great to type on, and the backlit keyboard feature is a lovely touch. I was very fortunate to get a great price - probably the best £380 I have ever spent. The only issue so far is that after upgrading to Windows 8.1, I could no longer adjust the screen brightness, and had to roll back the graphics driver to make it work again. But aside from that, it's superb.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Had this for two months now and very happy with everything.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this laptop. Have not encountered any problems, other than trying to find my way about Windows8. I put Office 2013 on it s well, which is also new to me. I have not had any problems with the screen, which seems to have been an issue with other reviewers and almost put me off buying it. I do not do any gaming or high tech stuff so perhaps that makes a difference. I think that this has been a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mack

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Laptop - Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is my first lap top and I was advised by a friend who is really up on these things that the Lenovo was an excellent product. I have been really impressed with my Laptop, touch screen is awesome, windows 8 is very very good and the overall operation of this computer is excellent. I would have no hesitation in recommending this Laptop to anyone looking for a new computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This badboy does it all and more. The touchscreen works awesomely (although its not strictly necessary to use most of the time), the keyboard is one sexy back-lit mother, it plays games well and runs quietly as. I would definitely recommend this laptop to anyone, although if you have the cash to spring for the i5 or the i7 processor I would do, just to make things run faster for the sake of it, but as is this is a pretty spectacular piece of machine. Bravo Lenovo, bravo.
customer_reviews.author: kaeyo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laptop. bought this as my old pc .was very slow. Bit of a change for me with windows 8 but am getting used to it.Nice backlight on keyboard, nice touchscreen,fast enough for all the jobs i need it to do. very happy with it and expect it to be that way for some years. My first lenovo product.
customer_reviews.author: steampod

customer_reviews.title: Like the Laptop but Windows 8 is awful!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this laptop for a replacement of our DELL. Cant complain about the hardware......does what it says. One little bug bear is the poor quality resolution.....bit grainy. Software however is........AWFUL!! I hate Windows 8 and with the upgrade it has made my computer slow. Microsoft get your act together!!!
customer_reviews.author: DaveTommo

customer_reviews.title: All good. Apart of hard drive which started ailing after ...
customer_reviews.text: All good. Apart of hard drive which started ailing after 2-3 years. It was bit tricky to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Kludczynski

customer_reviews.title: the best can't be beaten
customer_reviews.text: the best but after a year it stopped charging, it needed the battery software upgrade from the 'Lenovo owners group' to cure it
customer_reviews.author: robin andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent apart from hard power fault. Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a couple of weeks. Then developed a hard power fault. Had to return it to Amazon for a full refund. Would definitely buy another Z500 - if there were any available (all sold out - Christmas I guess). Negatives (apart from the power fault) - 1 it's heavy and 2 - Only getting 3 or hours between battery charges.
customer_reviews.author: stephen elvidge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, had it from the warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, had it from the warehouse. No issues with it. Took a star off because the mouse is abit sensitive, but I'm sure the settings might alter that

customer_reviews.title: http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B00C9UTNB6/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_0
customer_reviews.text: GREAT laptop. good price, delivered quickly.good touchscreen. cant fault it really.others said in reviews that the screen was terrible but i havent found that at all. the screen is great on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Decent Laptop let down by Windows 8 clitche's
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd laptop i've used that is let down by Windows 8. Lenovo, Toshiba, Fujitsu. Using the touchpad and all of a sudden the side panel flips open and then opens start screen and all i was doing was moving the cursor to the left side of desktop. 3 laptops, 3 manufacturers same problem. Fingers crossed things are better with 8.1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery/Stylish laptop (i3 version)
customer_reviews.text: Very much liked the fast delivery and the laptop itself is nice, however it could be a bit better for the price I paid.

product_meta.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Z500 15.6-inch Touchscreen Laptop (Dark Chocolate) - (Intel Core i3 3120M 2.5GHz Processor, 6GB RAM, 1TB HDD, DVDRW, LAN, WLAN, BT, Webcam, Integrated Graphics, Windows 8)
product_meta.description:
Work quickly with 10-point multi-touch display, which is optimised to work with Windows 8 THE LENOVO IDEAPAD Z500 TOUCH NOTEBOOK - STYLE, PERFORMANCE AND MULTI-MEDIA ALL-IN-ONE
Powered by 3rd generation Intel Core processors and featuring 10-point multi-touch display, the Lenovo IdeaPad Z500 notebook delivers a memorable computing experience, with a touch of stylish flair. Filled with fun multi-media features and pre-loaded Lenovo software that provides peace-of-mind, the Z series laptops help users do more.

The IdeaPad Z500 laptops are available in a range of colours, including Dark Chocolate and Gun Metal and offer a balance of affordability, performance, and multi-media features.

10-POINT MULTI-TOUCH DISPLAY
Enjoy greater accuracy with the 10-point multi-touch display, which is optimised to work with Microsoft Windows 8. Easily share files, photos, videos and more with tablet-style display with easy scroll and zoom functions.

MAINSTREAM PERFORMANCE AND MULTI-MEDIA FEATURES
3RD GENERATION INTEL CORE PROCESSOR FAMILY*
The Lenovo IdeaPad Z500 features the 3rd generation Intel Core family of processors, including the intelligent Intel Core i3, i5 and i7 processors. Users get a laptop with amazing performance and stunning visuals due to Intel's Hyper-Threading Technology, Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0, and a suite of visual enhancements.

Lenovo IdeaPad Z500 15.6-inch Touchscreen Laptop INTEL HYPER-THREADING (HT) TECHNOLOGY
Intel HT Technology enables each processor core to work on two tasks at the same time; the smart multi-tasking performance allows the user to move between applications quickly and without hesitation. This is where to start for visibly smart performance. 

INTEGRATED DVD READER/WRITER 
 The IdeaPad Z500 features an optical disc drive to allow you to easily watch your favourite DVD films, install games, or transfer files. You can also safely back-up files onto a blank disc using the writing function, making it easier to protect and transport your media.

15.6" LED BACKLIT HD DISPLAY
Films, games and the Internet all come to life on the Lenovo IdeaPad Z500. Featuring a 15.6" LED-backlit display, you'll be able to enjoy your favourite films and web videos in HD resolution (1366 x 768) and in glorious 16:9 widescreen.

USB 3.0 FOR FASTER CONNECTIONS
By connecting the Lenovo IdeaPad Z500 to a compatible USB 3.0 device, such as an external drive, 3.0 can offer up to 10 times faster transfer rates than standard USB 2.0. This means that files and folders that took hours to transfer now just take minutes, and you can move whole albums to and from your laptop in seconds - saving you time and making your media more portable.

DOLBY HOME THEATER V4
Listening to music, movies, and games on your PC will never be the same. With the Dolby Home Theater v4 audio tools, you can experience riveting surround sound on your PC.

Dolby Home Theater v4 fixes problems typically associated with PC audio - tinny sound, weak volume, buzzing and rattling. Experience full-impact surround sound anywhere with Dolby Home Theater v4 on your PC. All the power and nuance of the cinema, all the immediacy of live performance from a laptop. 

 The IdeaPad Z500 also comes with two built-in stereo speakers, allowing you to enjoy great quality sound without wires.

The Intelligent Touchpad allows you to perform intuitive multi-finger commands. Larger image. The AccuType keyboard helps make typing easier. Larger image. STYLISH DESIGN AND USABILITY
ACCUTYPE KEYBOARD
The AccuType keyboard is designed to help easy cleaning and maintenance and avoid the accumulation of dust and crumbs over time. The finger-friendly curved key shape and ergonomic spacebar will work together to make it easier to type and reduce the number of typos, wherever you find yourself working.

INTELLIGENT TOUCHPAD
The one-piece Intelligent Touchpad makes your touchpad experience more intuitive. You'll find the freedom to use multi-finger gestures to perform common tasks - whether it's a two-finger movement to rotate an image or a three-finger swipe to move between multiple pages/images.

Get the most out of your battery with Lenovo Energy Management 7.0. Larger image. VERIFACE
The Lenovo IdeaPad Z500 also comes with VeriFace technology which is a fun and secure way to log into your PC. For the VeriFace technology your face is your password and supports multiple users. It also checks head movement and other characteristics to determine if a photograph is being used to log-in.

DISCOVER AND SHARE
Lenovo Cloud - Imagine your files, everywhere. Lenovo's online storage and cloud utilities allow you the freedom to choose your device and location. With 5 GB of free storage, you'll be able to secure and access your files wherever you are, and on whatever machine you find yourself on.

The IdeaPad Z500 also offers exclusive Lenovo Content - delivering music, games and videos that is not available elsewhere.

LENOVO ENERGY MANAGEMENT 7.0
With Lenovo Energy Management 7.0, you can run your machine in a variety of different modes, depending on their needs. Power-Saver mode allows laptops to run exceptionally quietly with reduced fan noise. Balanced mode auto-detects user behaviour and knows when to run in a lower performance mode, allowing increased energy savings. High-Performance mode utilises a combination of high performance and thermal solution to increase performance levels.

Protect and prolong your battery health by using features such as battery protection mode and battery gauge. Lenovo's energy management system can even monitor laptop behaviour and highlight battery modes that best suit your needs.
